name: Tax Returns API
description: Build custom dashboards and analytics tools that pull live tax return data. Integrate with project management tools, time tracking software, or BI platforms to monitor return progress, automate client workflows, and generate real-time reports across your entire client base.
useCase: Automatically sync tax return data with your practice management system. When a return is accepted, trigger notifications to clients via SMS or email.
logicFlow: 1. Authenticate with API key ‚Üí 2. Query return by client ID ‚Üí 3. Retrieve return data ‚Üí 4. Process updates ‚Üí 5. Monitor status changes

endpoints.description: List all tax returns with optional filtering

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: Filter by return status (draft, filed, accepted)

endpoints.description: Get detailed information about a specific tax return

name: Diagnostics API
description: Create automated quality control systems that scan returns for errors before filing. Build review workflows in tools like Monday.com, Asana, or custom apps that flag issues, assign tasks to preparers, and track resolution‚Äîeliminating manual review bottlenecks.
useCase: Automatically run diagnostics on all returns before the filing deadline. Generate reports highlighting common issues across your client base.
logicFlow: 1. Submit return ID ‚Üí 2. Run diagnostic checks ‚Üí 3. Receive diagnostic results ‚Üí 4. Process errors/warnings ‚Üí 5. Generate report

endpoints.description: Run diagnostics on a tax return

parameters.name: returnId
parameters.description: The ID of the return to diagnose

name: E-file API
description: Build bulk filing automation that processes hundreds of returns with one script. Integrate with Slack, Microsoft Teams, or custom notification systems to alert staff instantly when returns are accepted or rejected‚Äîno more manual status checking.
useCase: Automate the e-filing process for bulk submissions. Get real-time status updates when returns are accepted or rejected by the IRS.
logicFlow: 1. Prepare return ‚Üí 2. Submit for e-filing ‚Üí 3. Receive acknowledgment ‚Üí 4. Monitor status ‚Üí 5. Handle acceptance/rejection

endpoints.description: Submit a tax return for e-filing
Check the status of an e-file submission

name: Client Sync API
description: Connect ProConnect with Salesforce, HubSpot, Karbon, or any CRM to create a single source of truth for client data. Build two-way sync workflows so address updates, contact changes, and client notes flow automatically between systems‚Äîno more duplicate data entry.
useCase: Keep client information synchronized across systems. When a client updates their address in your CRM, automatically sync to ProConnect.
logicFlow: 1. Detect client data changes ‚Üí 2. Push updates to ProConnect ‚Üí 3. Pull latest client data ‚Üí 4. Resolve conflicts ‚Üí 5. Update both systems

name: Document Bridge API
description: Integrate with SharePoint, Box, Dropbox, or document management systems to automatically route client W-2s, 1099s, and receipts directly into ProConnect. Build client portals where documents uploaded by clients instantly attach to the right return‚Äîeliminating manual document handling.
useCase: Automatically route documents from your document management system to ProConnect. Attach W-2s, 1099s, and other tax documents to returns.
logicFlow: 1. Upload document ‚Üí 2. Associate with return/client ‚Üí 3. Process document ‚Üí 4. Extract data (optional) ‚Üí 5. Store in ProConnect

name: Payments API
description: Connect with QuickBooks, Xero, or your accounting software to automatically sync payment data. Build client billing portals that process payments and instantly update both your accounting system and ProConnect‚Äîcreating a seamless financial workflow with automatic receipt generation.
useCase: Integrate payment processing with your billing system. Automatically record payments and send receipts to clients.
logicFlow: 1. Initiate payment ‚Üí 2. Process payment ‚Üí 3. Record transaction ‚Üí 4. Update return status ‚Üí 5. Send confirmation

name: Forms API
description: Build custom client portals that generate tax forms on-demand, or integrate with email automation tools to send personalized form packages. Pull form data into Power BI or Tableau for tax planning analytics‚Äîturning static forms into actionable insights for advisory services.
useCase: Generate custom form reports for clients. Automatically populate forms with data from your system.
logicFlow: 1. Select form type ‚Üí 2. Populate form data ‚Üí 3. Generate PDF ‚Üí 4. Store or send form ‚Üí 5. Track form status
